LanguageData.Hollowing_Setting_PlayerPawns: Player pawns can generate with the darksign
LanguageData.Hollowing_Setting_NonPlayerPawns: Non-player pawns can generate with the darksign
LanguageData.Hollowing_Setting_FactionlessPawns: Factionless pawns can generate with the darksign
LanguageData.Hollowing_Setting_HumanPawns: Only pawns of the human race can generate with a darksign
LanguageData.Hollowing_Setting_DarksignChance: The chance a pawn generates with the darksign
LanguageData.Hollowing_Setting_HollowingGain: The amount a pawn hollows upon reanimation
LanguageData.Hollowing_Setting_MoodDebuffMult: Multiplier applied to the hollowing mood debuff
LanguageData.Hollowing_Setting_ResurrectionBeserk: Pawns can go beserk after resurrecting
LanguageData.Hollowing_Setting_ResurrectionTime: The number of ticks taken for a pawn to resurrect
